sentence: More  than  15,000  Palestinians  have  been  killed  since  the  start  of  the  conflict,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  Gaza  Ministry  of  Health.
The  Gaza  health  ministry  also  says  more  than  300  Palestinians  have  been  killed  and  hundreds  more  wounded  since  the  fighting  resumed  four  days  ago.
On  Oct.  7,  the  Palestinian  Islamist  militant  group  launched  a  surprise  attack  on  southern  Israel  that  killed  1,200  people,  Israel  says.
